Text:
Thanks, I really do appreciate the awesome uploads you have done. I have not downloaded all of them but the ones I have are flawless. 
I have a couple of suggestions for future uploads if you could please take into consideration?

Rising Sun 1993 http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0107969/
The Mask Of Zorro 1999 http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0120746/
Major Payne 1995 http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0110443/
Space Cowboys 2000 http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0186566/
After The Sunset 2005 http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0367479/

I have searched on 300mbunited and they were not listed, I have downloaded a couple on here but they were not really all that great, couple had problems....Would appreciate it if they are in the 720p quality if possible. They all have blu-ray editions out. The Boondock Saints/Armageddon were on that list but I found them on 300mbunited, lol.

I do have patience and can wait, all I need is a yes/no answer. Many thanks in advance if someone can get them!!
I meant *you can get them* sorry
Terrible quality, I don't know how you can claim a 400 pixel high movie is 720p. I wasted time downloading these.
This is awesome. I downloaded all the movies and they are very good. Thank you YIFY. You ROCK.
